item.description:
Obsessed RUN TIME 1 hr. 45 min. MPAA RATING
(PG-13), for sexual material including some suggestive dialogue, some violence and thematic content
Showtime & Date
2:20pm, the afternoon of Sun, May 17th
Blackstone Valley 14: Cinema de Lux
70 Worcester/Providence Turnpike
The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley
Millbury, MA 01527
(508) 853-4000
I'll have a meetup sign. Let's get our seats no later than 2:10 pm so please be there by 2 pm and get your tickets purchased. I've heard this has great reviews! Good way to spend time on a rainy Sunday!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby - get your tickets prior to the start please.
item.name: LAST MINUTE MOVIE TODAY - 'OBSESSED'!
